left.sql: --VARIABLES_START --{ -- "variables" : [ { -- "@type" : "SQLVariableConfig", -- "name" : "TODAY", -- "hbdbid" : "dwv2-production", -- "sql" : "select * from DIM_DATE where calendar_date = trunc(sysdate)" -- } ] --} --VARIABLES_END select ${TODAY.PREV_WORKING_DATE_ID} DATE_ID, 'EMPTY' RESULT from dual
